CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name, 'M_Occupy',IF(Is_Industry__c == 'Y' && Is_Niaga__c == 'Y','Industry - Niaga', IF(Is_Industry__c == 'Y' && Is_Niaga__c == 'N','Industri - Non Niaga', IF(Is_Industry__c == 'N' && Is_Niaga__c == 'Y','Non Industry - Niaga', IF(Is_Industry__c == 'N' && Is_Niaga__c == 'N','Non Industry - Non Niaga','')))), '' )
CustomField.label: Type Description
